summary: *Puella Magi Madoka Magica* is a popular Japanese anime about middle school girls who become magical warriors. The main character, Madoka, and her friends fight powerful enemies called witches. As they battle, they discover the dark side of being a magical girl. The anime, which started in 2011, has been a big hit and has led to many spin-offs, including manga, novels, games, and movies. It's known for its exciting story, beautiful art, and unique take on the magical girl genre.
title: Puella Magi Madoka Magica
